professionalIntro: I'm a full-stack software engineer and artist. I focus mainly on backend systems, but I don't mind UI work either. My overarching aim is to create exciting things that benefit real people.
personalIntro: I like to read, play the piano, and get outdoors. My #1 hobby is definately slogging up large mountains.
contactBody: Feel free to connect on Linkedin, or email me!
